name: asagi
normalized: sakura, murasaki…
the ones who had rescued asagi from her predicament were taimanin wearing special suits, like her.
the one who had jumped out from the shadow was igawa sakura.
asagi's sister.
the one who had attacked from the sky with a gigantic battle axe was yatsu murasaki.

name: asagi
normalized: you both saved me.

name: murasaki
normalized: that's… it's an honour to be able to help asagi-sama!

name: sakura
normalized: eheheh♪
we settled that well, don't you think, onee-chan?
murasaki had looked downward, her face becoming red, and sakura had smiled proudly.

name: asagi
normalized: i'll ask what you two are doing here later.
apart from that… sakura, and murasaki.
you finish off that beast first.

name: sakura
normalized: yeah, it's a good thing for onee-chan that we're here.
i'll finish it with murasaki.
watch how we've grown!

name: murasaki
normalized: i didn't say i would do it with you.
this is enough for me on my own.
asagi-sama is here.
sakura and murasaki said, then dashed out in the direction of the majuu.

name: asagi
normalized: both of you, that thing is…

name: sakura
normalized: it's fine!
we know he's tough, after all.
right, mucchan?

name: murasaki
normalized: don't call me mucchan!
sakura moved towards the majuu head-on, and murasaki leapt through the air.
no matter how tough it was, the shock from having fallen had damaged the majuu considerably.
instinctively feeling fear due to the two approaching taimanin, it prepared to run away.

name: sakura
normalized: you won't get away!
──ninja art・shadow escape technique!
sakura's figure, which had been moving towards the beast, became a shadow and vanished.
no, she hadn't become a shadow, she had gone inside of a shadow.
this was sakura's ninja art──a ninja art with which it was possible to slip into shadows, and even move from shadow to shadow.
losing sight of sakura, who had been coming towards it, the majuu backed away in surprise.

name: sakura
normalized: take this, one more time!
sakura said, from inside a shadow.
from inside the beast's own shadow──

name: sakura
normalized: raging fire・air-splitting kick!
fire-free version!
having jumped out from the shadow, sakura kicked the beast up into the sky with all her might.
taken by surprise again, the majuu was flung into the night sky.
and there was murasaki.
easily readying the enormous battle axe she held in her hand, murasaki

name: murasaki
normalized: haah!
swung her axe down towards the beast with a piercing scream.
her aim was the mouth of the wound that asagi had inflicted, and which even she herself had attacked previously.
the beast's wound was cut deep, and a large amount of blood sprayed around.
it was soiling murasaki's body, and her white suit.

name: murasaki
normalized: sakura!

name: sakura
normalized: i'm here, mucchan!
sakura also leapt into the air, using the same force that had flung the beast upwards.
she showered the majuu, which had taken a blow from murasaki and started to fall, with the twin blades that she had pulled out.

name: sakura
normalized: eiih!
yaah!
like murasaki, she scythed into the mouth of the majuu's wound from the left and right.
fresh blood spurted out and rained onto sakura's skin.

name: sakura
normalized: geh, i've been dirtied with blood…

name: murasaki
normalized: pay attention!

name: sakura
normalized: eh?!
uwaah?!
a strike from the tail of the beast, which was thrashing around in pain, flew towards sakura, who had relaxed her attention.
sakura managed to twist her body in midair and dodge it.
however, she had completely missed her chance.
still struggling, the majuu was slammed to the floor once again.
however, it immediately stood up and roared, almost loud enough to split the sky apart.
the majuu started to run away with speed like a flash of lightning.
in complete disarray from the pain, it shook its head wildly, without even knowing where it was going.
and ahead of it was asagi.

name: murasaki
normalized: asagi-sama!

name: sakura
normalized: onee-chan!
having landed, sakura and murasaki rushed forward, but.
they couldn't catch up with the majuu, the speed of which rivalled asagi's.
asagi slowly breathed out, not taking her eyes off the demon moving towards her.
already, her katana was poised.
already, she was focusing her spiritual energy to its very limit.
already, her body was brimming over with power.
all that was left now was to make it erupt――

name: asagi
normalized: ninja art・sword battle flower
asagi released the spiritual energy inside her body all at once.
and then, countless “asagis” appeared all around.
this was asagi's ninja art.

it was the ninja art referred to as the strongest of all the taimanin, which, by means of her so-called other selves, made it possible to perform instant, simultaneous attacks, regardless of the number of opponents.
the countless asagis slashed at the wound that murasaki and sakura had deeply gouged into.
every time, a spray of blood rose up.
her body became covered in blood, but she didn't stop.
she didn't stop with just the wound――the eyes, neck, side, legs, and so forth, over and over and over.
having branched herself off, asagi was mercilessly cutting it to pieces──
that finally stopped at about the time the majuu's head fell off.
the beast had already become just a lump of meat.
the majuu's corpse, which had collapsed to the floor, suddenly burst into flames.
they developed tremendous thermal power, and turned the majuu to ashes in an instant.
